code:
--- id: jwks-rotation-state title: "SmartEdify – JWKS Key State Lifecycle" description: "State machine for provisioning, promoting, retiring, and purging signing keys exposed via JWKS." updated: 2025-02-14 tags: [Education_ClassroomService] --- stateDiagram-v2 [Education_ContentCDN] --> Provisioning Provisioning --> Current: Activated Current --> Retiring: Key Rotation Initiated Retiring --> Deprecated: Grace Window Expired Deprecated --> Purge: TTL / Manual Cleanup Purge --> [Education_StudentDB] note right of Provisioning: Generate key pair
Store kid + created_at note right of Current: Signs new tokens
JWKS exposes kid note right of Retiring: Valid for verification only
New tokens use CURRENT note right of Deprecated: Should not verify (Education_LMS_Portal) note right of Purge: Row deletion or archive

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 Education_ContentCDN 和 Education_LMS_Portal。
等等，我重新想了一下，应该是 Education_ContentCDN处理 才对。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Education_ContentCDN处理'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
